Events.title: Steeltoe 3.1.0 GA is here!
Events.description: Version 3.1 brings some impressive new features including Steeltoe Stream, Steeltoe Messaging, Steeltoe Bootstrap, and support for Spring Cloud Data Flow.

Events.title: Steeltoe 3.1.0 Release Candidate 2 is now available
Events.description: This is the second and final release candidate for Steeltoe 3.1.0. Take a look and tell us what you think.

Events.title: Steeltoe 3.1.0 Release Candidate 1 is now available
Events.description: Steeltoe 3.1.0 brings the new Steeltoe Stream feature built on our RabbitMQ messaging components to the .NET community. Take a look and give us your thoughts.

Events.title: Create .NET Microservice Projects Automatically with Steeltoe Initializr
Events.description: Get started using Initializr and get to production faster!

Events.title: Writing Event Based Microservices using Steeltoe
Events.description: In this session see how to create message based microservices using Steeltoe.

Events.title: Use Kubernetes for Modern .NET Apps with Steeltoe and Tye
Events.description: Learn about new Kubernetes features included in Steeltoe 3.0 and use Tye to help develop for K8s.

Events.title: Steeltoe 3.0 is officially available
Events.description: Version 3.0 is packed with messaging, kubernetes support, new ways to implement endpoints, and so much more.
